TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetricsAdvisorAdministrationClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The client to use to connect to the Metrics Advisor Cognitive Service to handle administrative operations, configuring the behavior of the service. It provides the ability to create and manage data feeds, anomaly detection configurations, anomaly alerting configurations, hooks, and credential entities.
